skills.desc: Attacks 1 enemy. Has a 35% chance of increasing the cooldown of one of the target's Skills by 1 turn at random.
skills.name: Confounding Crush
skills.books:
Lvl. 2 Damage +5%
Lvl. 3 Buff/Debuff Chance +5%
Lvl. 4 Buff/Debuff Chance +5%
Lvl. 5 Buff/Debuff Chance +5%

skills.desc: Attacks 1 enemy 2 times. Each hit has a 75% chance of decreasing the Turn Meter by 5%. Decreases the Turn Meter by 10% instead if target is under a [Decrease ATK] debuff.
skills.name: Beat Back
skills.books:
Lvl. 2 Damage +10%
Lvl. 3 Buff/Debuff Chance +10%
Lvl. 4 Buff/Debuff Chance +15%

skills.desc: Attacks all enemies. Has a 75% chance of placing a 50% [Decrease ATK] debuff for 2 turns.
skills.name: Rampaging Swipe
skills.books:
Lvl. 2 Damage +5%
Lvl. 3 Damage +10%
Lvl. 4 Buff/Debuff Chance +10%
Lvl. 5 Buff/Debuff Chance +15%

skills.desc: Each hit has a 50% chance of decreasing the target's Turn Meter by 7.5%. Each hit also has a 50% chance of putting one of the target's Skills on cooldown if the target is under a [Decrease C. RATE] debuff.
skills.name: Ursine Brutality [P]
skills.books:
